channel.title: Epistemic Planner on Alessandro Burigana

item.title: DAEDALUS - DynAmic Epistemic and DoxAstic Logic Universal Solver
item.description: DynAmic Epistemic and DoxAstic Logic Universal Solver. Solver for DEL-based epistemic planning problems.

item.title: DELPHIC ASP - An Answer Set Programming model of the DELPHIC semantics
item.description: An Answer Set Programming model of the DELPHIC semantics for DEL-based epistemic planning problems.

item.title: PLATO - ePistemic muLti-agent Answer seT programming sOlver
item.description: ePistemic muLti-agent Answer seT programming sOlver. Solver for epistemic planning problems based on the mA* language.

item.title: EFP 2.0 - Epistemic Forward Planner
item.description: Epistemic Forward Planner. Solver for epistemic planning problems based on the mA* language.
